item.title: By: căn hộ richmond city

item.description: What an amazing looking cake, you are very talented !!!!!
item.content:encoded: What an amazing looking cake, you are very talented !!!!!

item.title: By: Caroline
item.dc:creator: Caroline
item.description: Yum Anita, I still love seeing you updates even though it's been almost 5 years since we worked together. I just made this for my sister for her 40th birthday after seeing your post. We substituted the jam layers for one of fresh strawberries and the other of raspberries and it was delicious!
item.content:encoded: Yum Anita, I still love seeing you updates even though it’s been almost 5 years since we worked together. I just made this for my sister for her 40th birthday after seeing your post. We substituted the jam layers for one of fresh strawberries and the other of raspberries and it was delicious!

item.title: By: Maggie
item.dc:creator: Maggie
item.description: Wow!!! Now that is a Pavlova!! Looks gorgeous and I imagine it tastes as amazing as it looks.
item.content:encoded: Wow!!! Now that is a Pavlova!! Looks gorgeous and I imagine it tastes as amazing as it looks.

item.title: By: Cath
item.dc:creator: Cath
item.description: Wow - what an amazing effort! It does look super sweet - thanks for showing how you did the meringue peaks with the pink stripe - I was wondering how you managed it!
item.content:encoded: Wow – what an amazing effort! It does look super sweet – thanks for showing how you did the meringue peaks with the pink stripe – I was wondering how you managed it!
